CLEAN SMART Act of 2024
Combining Laboratory Expertise to Accelerate Novel Solutions for Minimizing Accumulated Radioactive Toxins Act of 2024

A bill to accelerate the development, demonstration, and deployment of new technologies and innovative solutions to address the environmental cleanup mission of the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
